summary: Comprehensive testing completed for Bee It Feedback system. Backend APIs are fully functional with 84% success rate. Frontend login, navigation, and role-based dashboards working correctly for all three user roles (Admin, Gestor, Colaborador). All core features tested including authentication, dashboard metrics, feedback management, and role-based permissions.

minor_issues.issue: Backend test script logic incorrectly marking successful API calls as failures
minor_issues.details: APIs are returning correct 201 status codes and valid data with IDs, but test script expected different response format
minor_issues.impact: No functional impact - APIs working correctly

minor_issues.issue: Error message not visually displayed for invalid login attempts
minor_issues.details: Invalid login correctly prevents access and keeps user on login page, but no visible error message shown to user

minor_issues.issue: Some pages show loading spinner longer than expected
minor_issues.details: Dashboard and other pages sometimes show loading spinner for 2-3 seconds

passed_tests: Dashboard metrics displaying correctly for all roles
All CRUD operations for users, teams, feedbacks, action plans
action_item_for_main_agent: Minor UI improvement needed: Add visible error message display for invalid login attempts. Consider reducing loading spinner duration for better user experience.
